discourse_list.title: The SHCU shall fulfill it's mandate

content.content: As the first of two formal votes to offboard me approaches it’s close… we all know the last hour is when the fireworks begin, right? Anyway… my mandate is my north star      MIP39c2-SP11: Strategic Happiness Core Unit   Airdrop Candidates Some examples of likely airdrop candidates: Doubters and haters   Everyone that voted “Yes,” on this poll…(looking at u @Doo_StableLab <3 ) Please reach out to me for a final airdrop! (not a lot of time!) I am bound by my mandate after all!!  Much love to all

aburban90:  Everyone that voted “Yes,” on this poll…(looking at u @Doo_StableNode <3 )      MIP39c2-SP11: Strategic Happiness Core Unit   Doubters and haters    To be clear, it’s not a personal matter. I would challenge any CU in similar situation with lack of clear budget oversight and breakdown. And I even voted against Growth team while was there based on core values. So don’t think that I am voting because of some personal reasons.

@Doo_StableLab  I doo love you, don’t forget that   And ofc I know it’s not personal! As for the logic behind voting in favor of the current proposal over the next? Is there a rush? I was looking forward to enjoying my last meal!   But, joking aside… I respect your decision. All is well : ) When we meet up next time in Europe, or maybe even Latam? We’ll hug it out
StableNode team including I will be in Bogota for Devcon. Ok, the almost last meal will be on me
This topic was automatically closed after 90 days. New replies are no longer allowed.
